document_data.mainbody:
Dundold Buldharroaz was a baker inhabiting Waterdeep, the City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Dundold was the guildmaster for the Bakers Guild circa 1357 DR. He worked out of the Master Bakers Hallâ€“their headquarters on the Street of the Sword in the Castle Ward.
